dynamicVariables.query: SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE status = 'ACTIVE' AND last_login_date >= '${startDate}'
SELECT company_code, company_name FROM companies WHERE status = 'ACTIVE'
SELECT MAX(order_id) as max_id FROM orders

dynamicVariables.description: 특정 카테고리의 모든 상품 ID 추출
dynamicVariables.query: SELECT product_id, category_id FROM products WHERE category_id IN (${categoryIds})

queries.sourceQuery: SELECT user_id, username, email, created_date, company_code FROM users WHERE created_date >= '${startDate}' AND created_date <= '${endDate}' AND company_code = '${companyCode}' ORDER BY user_id
queries.deleteWhere: WHERE created_date >= '${startDate}' AND created_date <= '${endDate}' AND company_code = '${companyCode}' ORDER BY user_id

queries.description: 상품 테이블 전체 데이터 이관 (SELECT * 사용)
queries.sourceQuery: SELECT * FROM products WHERE status = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY product_id

queries.description: 주문 테이블 데이터 이관 (SQL 파일 사용)
특정 상태의 상품 데이터 이관 (IN절 사용)
queries.sourceQuery: SELECT product_id, product_name, category_id, price, status FROM products WHERE status IN (${statusList}) AND category_id IN (${categoryIds}) ORDER BY product_id
queries.deleteWhere: WHERE status IN (${statusList}) AND category_id IN (${categoryIds})

queries.description: 특정 부서 직원 데이터 이관 (IN절 사용)
queries.sourceQuery: SELECT emp_id, emp_name, department_code, hire_date, salary FROM employees WHERE department_code IN (${departmentCodes}) AND hire_date >= '${startDate}' ORDER BY emp_id

queries.description: 상품 테이블 데이터 이관 (SQL 파일 + IN절 변수 사용)
queries.deleteWhere: WHERE status IN (${statusList}) AND category_id IN (${categoryIds}) AND created_date >= '${startDate}' AND created_date <= '${endDate}'

queries.description: 활성 사용자의 주문 데이터 이관 (동적 변수 사용)
queries.sourceQuery: SELECT order_id, user_id, order_date, total_amount, status FROM orders WHERE user_id IN (${activeUserIds}) AND order_date >= '${startDate}' ORDER BY order_date DESC

queries.description: 추출된 상품 관련 데이터 이관 (동적 변수 사용)
queries.sourceQuery: SELECT * FROM product_reviews WHERE product_id IN (${categoryProductIds}) AND rating >= 4
